title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Advocate for your pleasure and advance toward it as you work diligently on a tough task. The idea that the end justifies the means is reserved for the soul who isnt enjoying itself along the way. Deferring your dreams only works for so long before they can get too far away from you. Instead, see each action as indispensable toward a larger goal. Use the sensual delight of the Taurus Moons presence in your 8th House of Transformation to convert lemons into lemonade. You dont necessarily need to wait for better days when they can be pretty good in the moment. Joy is the essential ingredient for your success. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
